function.name: valuelist
function.help: Inserts a delimiter between each value in an executed query. CFML does not evaluate the arguments. A delimited list of the values of each record returned from an executed query

parameter.name: column
parameter.help: Name of an executed query and column. Separate query name and column name with a period.

parameter.name: delimiter
parameter.help: A delimiter character to separate column data items. Default: comma (,).
